analysis.key_quote: It amplifies hyperpartisanship. Reclassifying so many jobs as 'at-will' promotes a system where every incoming administration drastically retools the face of the federal workforce - not just replacing lead administrators, but rank-and-file workers serving the federal government.
analysis.rationale: The comment clearly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about hyperpartisanship and the loss of institutional knowledge, which are critical indicators of opposition to the politicization of civil service.
